description: Mobile techniques used by RuMMS, ATT&CK software S0313 v1.1
name: RuMMS (S0313)

techniques.comment: RuMMS uploads incoming SMS messages to a remote command and control server.
RuMMS is delivered via an SMS message containing a link to an APK (Android application package).
RuMMS uses HTTP for command and control.
RuMMS gathers device model and operating system version information and transmits it to a command and control server.
RuMMS gathers the device phone number and IMEI and transmits them to a command and control server.
